title: HTML5 Image Editor
description:
See it working at: http://felipenmoura.org/labs/html5-imager/
This tool helps you changing the hue and saturation of images, as well as it can be used as a color picker. You can also pick a color, and remove all the pixels in the image that correspond to that color.

Check this out on github: https://github.com/felipenmoura/html5-imager

title: Experiment: Stereoscopic 3D using JS, HTML and CSS
description:
A video where I demonstrate an experiment of mine, applying Stereoscopic 3D to a webpage using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
More experiments at http://felipenmoura.org :)

title: ChromaKey in JavaScript
description:
During the W3C's WebBR-2012 I had the opportunity to give two talks.
This talk had no slides, just live coding!
We built in one hour, with just 100 JavaScript lines of code, a chroma key effect with Open Web Technologies, such as HTML5 and CSS3.

To do that, we used canvas, html5 video and the user's camera(user media). And also, a lot of math!

The source code and running demo is on github:

https://github.com/felipenmoura/js-chroma-key

title: Experiment: CSS3 3D environment tool
description:
This is the Root3D, the CSS3D environment: http://felipenmoura.org/projects/root3d
Everything you see here is made of DIVs with CSS3, running on a web browser.

In this video, I show you the demo I've built and how to use some of the tool's features.

I've been working on this tool for some time and I'd like you to test it and share your opinion and feedback.


** It is deprecated...once technology and even some of the syntax changed! Feel free to submit fixing patches! :)

title: Test your markup
description:
An HTML, CSS and JavaScript based game.
Test your knowledge about HTML tags in a fun way.
It's also great to practice and learn, as well.
http://felipenmoura.org/projects/test-your-markup/index.html
